title: How to USE AI to make ROBLOX MATERIALS in 30 seconds! (2023 Roblox AI Tutorial)
transcript: you can now use AI to generate infinite materials in Roblox Studio here's how First Open studio click file beta features and enable material generator restart Studio then click the material generator tab select a part and type in the material you want then select the material it should be a variant of save and apply then boom you just made a material with AI
